Question: VisionTrack Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
VisionTrack Inc

Product: Video Telematics Solution

- AI-powered cameras and MDVRs
- PTCRB-and FCC-approved next-generation dashcams and MDVRs
- Microsoft Azure, US-hosted IoT platform, Autonomise.ai
- US-based DevOps team
- Comprehensive range of fleet dashcams, mobile DVRs, and accessories
- Connected dashcams for quick liability proof and improved road safety
- 360º Vision MDVR for complete visibility
- AI-powered cameras for hazard detection
- Multi-channel cameras for internal and external visibility
- In-vehicle monitors for live views to drivers
- Blind spot and cyclist detection for improved road safety
- NARA AI post-analysis solution for incident validation
- Autonomise.ai IoT platform for real-time video and data analysis
- Advanced insurtech solutions for reduced claims frequency and cost
- Industry-leading innovation to improve road safety and claims management
Summary_cn:
VisionTrack Inc

产品：视频车载解决方案

- 基于人工智能的摄像头和MDVR
- PTCRB和FCC批准的下一代行车记录仪和MDVR
- 微软Azure，美国托管的物联网平台，Autonomise.ai
- 美国的DevOps团队
- 综合范围的车队行车记录仪，移动式录像机和配件
- 连接的行车记录仪，快速提供责任证明和改善道路安全
- 360º Vision MDVR，实现完全可见性
- 基于人工智能的摄像头，用于危险检测
- 多通道摄像头，用于内部和外部可见性
- 车内监视器，用于司机的实时视图
- 盲点和自行车检测，提高道路安全性
- NARA AI事故后分析解决方案，用于事故验证
- Autonomise.ai物联网平台，用于实时视频和数据分析
- 高级保险科技解决方案，降低索赔频率和成本
- 行业领先的创新，提高道路安全性和理赔管理能力
